snippet: Palestinian children detained by the Israeli military are subject to systematic ill-treatment that violates international law, a report by the United Nations Children’s Fund said.
abstract: United Nations Children's Fund issues report finding that Palestinian children detained by Israeli military are subject to widespread, systematic ill-treatment that violates international law.
lead_paragraph: Palestinian children detained by the Israeli military are subject to systematic ill-treatment that violates international law, a report by the United Nations Children’s Fund said.

headline.main: U.N. Finds Israeli Military Abuses Young Palestinians
headline.print_headline: U.N. Finds Israeli Military Abuses Young Palestinians

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
